entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 07:34 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:34 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
